# padding

**Interface Property**

The values that define content padding within the Look Around view frame.

## Declaration

```swift
padding?: Padding;
```

## Controlling Look Around behavior

- **isNavigationEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can navigate inside the Look Around view.
- **isScrollEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can scroll the Look Around view.
- **isZoomEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can scroll the Look Around view.
- **openDialog**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can scroll the Look Around view.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Look Around view display points of interest (POIs).
- **showsRoadLabels**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Look Around view display road labels.
